author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Staffing 360 Solutions Q1 Revenue Rose 37 Percent To $55.8 Mln
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Staffing 360 Solutions Inc:
* STAFFING 360 SOLUTIONS ANNOUNCES 2018 FIRST QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 REVENUE ROSE 37 PERCENT TO $55.8 MILLION * Q1 2018 NET LOSS OF $1.3 MILLION, A SUBSTANTIAL IMPROVEMENT AS COMPARED TO A NET LOSS OF $3.1 MILLION REPORTED FOR Q1 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
